childMarkdownRemark.html:
Alhumdolillah, it is our third Cycle of operation and the center has been gaining a lot of traction amoung local group of women who want to learn. The center opened up ready with a set of newly procured machines, clothing and acessories. the training facility has seen a significant growth in the number of women interested in participating in the learning experience which ranges from cutting, designing and stiching for varius types and sizes of clothing.

As the interest in the local community grew and more and more ladies wanted to join the learning expereince. the administration was proposed the idea to introduce another shift in the operating hours to accomodate the growing demands of the center.
Alhumdolillah, it is our third Cycle of operation and the center has been gaining a lot of traction amoung local group of women who want to learn.
